alert.note: Alert for Central Carbon County; Central Laramie County; Central Laramie Range and Southwest Platte County; East Laramie County; East Platte County; Laramie Valley; North Snowy Range Foothills; South Laramie Range; South Laramie Range Foothills; Upper North Platte River Basin (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 17 at 1:19AM MST until January 18 at 11:00AM MST by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 AM MST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Areas of blowing and drifting snow. * WHERE...Much of southeast Wyoming along and southwest of a line from Casper to Wheatland to Pine Bluffs. * WHEN...Until 11 AM MST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Hazardous travel conditions possible. Drifting snow may result in pockets of slick road conditions. Visibilities may be reduced to under one half mile at times.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
